name: FreeOffice Suite
short_description:
FreeOffice Suite is a collection of office productivity software solutions designed for businesses of all sizes.  Its modular design allows system administrators to install and remove each component individually while not affecting the core system.

Installation and removal of individual components is provided by FreeOffice Core, which includes a built-in downloader and updater utility.

This project is in early planning stages, so information will develop as the project evolves.
summary: Free and open source office software suite
